device_mount: Handheld; Placed loosely around user (e.g., table)
contribution_desc: This UbiComp paper proposes Prime, a framework for spontaneous use of a mobile application with high framerates, low latency, and fairness across multiple devices and platforms for collocated group activities, such as sharing an interactive music demonstration. The authors developed an online scheduling algorithm, a modified 802.11 MAC protocol, and an efficient video encoding pipeline for a local host-client remote display system architecture.
tracking_reliability: end-to-end touch-to-pixe median latency of 54 (+- 6.5) ms; 7 concurrent devices
device_models: Windows Surface Pro tablet; Samsung Series 7 tablet;
